original_title: Pippie Langkous. Het avontuur op de Zuidzee
overview: Pippi is visited by her father to go on a journey to the South See. Her friends Annika and Tommy come along with her. However, they are also accompanied by two crooks who sneak up on board in search for long last treasure.
title: Pippie Langkous. Het avontuur op de Zuidzee
